instantgamesbridge.name: InstantGamesBridge
instantgamesbridge.description: One SDK for cross-platform publishing HTML5 games
instantgamesbridge.author: Mewton Games

load-sdk-from-cdn.name: Load SDK from CDN
load-sdk-from-cdn.desc: If false - you should import SDK JS script into scripts folder and mark as main.

custom-cdn-url.name: Custom CDN URL
custom-cdn-url.desc: Custom CDN URL for loading SDK.

initialize-on-load.name: Initialize On Load
initialize-on-load.desc: Automatically initialize the SDK when it is loaded.

game-distribution-game-id.name: GameDistribution Game ID
game-distribution-game-id.desc: Game ID, which you can find from your control panel on GameDistribution.com.

show-interstitial-on-init.name: Show Interstitial On Init
show-interstitial-on-init.desc: Automatically show interstitial when SDK is initialized. Supported only on Yandex and Game Distribution.

append-storage-data-get-request.display-text: Append Storage Data Get Request. Key: [b]{0}[/b].

send-storage-data-get-request.display-text: Send Storage Data Get Request. Storage: [b]{0}[/b].

append-storage-data-set-request.display-text: Append Storage Data Set Request. Key: [b]{0}[/b]. Value: [b]{1}[/b].

send-storage-data-delete-request.display-text: Send Storage Data Delete Request. Storage: [b]{0}[/b].

set-storage-data.display-text: Set Storage Data. Key: [b]{0}[/b], value: [b]{1}[/b]. Storage: [b]{2}[/b].

show-banner.display-text: Show Banner. VK banner position: [b]{0}[/b]. Crazy Games responsive banner container ID: [b]{1}[/b]. Game Distribution banner container ID: [b]{2}[/b].

vk.name: VK
vk.desc: Position of the banner for VK. Possible values: top, bottom. Default: bottom.

set-minimum-delay-between-interstitial.display-text: Set Minimum Delay Between Interstitial. VK: [b]{0}[/b], Yandex: [b]{1}[/b], Crazy Games: [b]{2}[/b], Absolute Games: [b]{3}[/b], Game Distribution: [b]{4}[/b], Mock: [b]{5}[/b].

show-interstitial.display-text: Show Interstitial. Ignore Delay VK: [b]{0}[/b], Yandex: [b]{1}[/b], Crazy Games: [b]{2}[/b], Absolute Games: [b]{3}[/b], Game Distribution: [b]{4}[/b], Mock: [b]{5}[/b].

create-post.display-text: Create Post. VK Message: [b]{0}[/b], VK Attachments: [b]{1}[/b].

leaderboard-set-score.display-text: Set Leaderboard Score. Yandex Leaderboard Name: [b]{0}[/b], Yandex Score: [b]{1}[/b].

leaderboard-get-score.display-text: Get Leaderboard Score. Yandex Leaderboard Name: [b]{0}[/b].

leaderboard-get-entries.display-text: Get Leaderboard Entries. Yandex Leaderboard Name: [b]{0}[/b], Yandex Include User: [b]{1}[/b], Yandex Quantity Around: [b]{2}[/b], Yandex Quantity Top: [b]{3}[/b].

leaderboard-show-native-popup.display-text: Show Leaderboard Native Popup. VK User Result: [b]{0}[/b], VK Global: [b]{1}[/b].
